SELECT A.* FROM (
SELECT MWO.COMPANY_CD , MWO.DIVISION_CD , MWO.WORK_ORDER_ID , TO_CHAR(MWO.PLAN_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PLAN_DATE , MWO.WO_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MWO.COMPANY_CD, MWO.DIVISION_CD, 'PP0002', MWO.WO_TYPE, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS WO_TYPE_NM , MWO.WO_STATE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MWO.COMPANY_CD, MWO.DIVISION_CD, 'PP0003', MWO.WO_STATE, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS WO_STATE_NM , MWO.ITEM_ID , MI.ITEM_NM , MWO.WORK_CENTER_CD , MWC.WORK_CENTER_NM , MWO.WO_QTY , MWO.MFG_UOM , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MWO.COMPANY_CD, MWO.DIVISION_CD, MWO.MFG_UOM) FROM DUAL) AS MFG_UOM_NM , MDL.ITEM_ID AS CONSUME_ITEM_ID , MIC.ITEM_NM AS CONSUME_ITEM_NM , MDL.REQ_QTY , MDL.MFG_UOM AS CONSUME_UOM , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_UNIT_NAME(MDL.COMPANY_CD, MDL.DIVISION_CD, MDL.MFG_UOM) FROM DUAL) AS CONSUME_UOM_NM , (MWO.WO_QTY * MDL.REQ_QTY) AS CONSUME_QTY , MIC.ITEM_TYPE AS CONSUME_ITEM_TYPE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MWO.COMPANY_CD, MWO.DIVISION_CD, 'MD0002', MIC.ITEM_TYPE, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS CONSUME_ITEM_TYPE_NM , MWO.LOT_MANAGEMENT_YN , MWO.LOT_RULE , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_CODE_NAME(MWO.COMPANY_CD, MWO.DIVISION_CD, 'MD0052', MWO.LOT_RULE, #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) FROM DUAL) AS LOT_RULE_NM , MWO.HCN_CD , MWO.PARENT_WO_ID AS ORIGIN_WO_ID , MWO.DESCRIPTION , ROWIDTOCHAR(MDL.ROWID) AS KEY_ID , COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTAL_COUNT , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY MWO.COMPANY_CD,MWO.DIVISION_CD ORDER BY MWO.WORK_ORDER_ID, MDL.ITEM_ID ) AS ROW_COUNT FROM MOM_WORK_ORDER MWO , MOM_MATERIAL_DEDUCT_LIST MDL , MOM_ITEM MI , MOM_WORK_CENTER MWC , MOM_ITEM MIC WHERE MWO.COMPANY_CD = MDL.COMPANY_CD AND MWO.DIVISION_CD = MDL.DIVISION_CD AND MWO.PARENT_WO_ID = MDL.WORK_ORDER_ID AND MDL.COMPANY_CD = MI.COMPANY_CD AND MDL.DIVISION_CD = MI.DIVISION_CD AND MDL.ITEM_ID = MI.ITEM_ID AND MWO.COMPANY_CD = MWC.COMPANY_CD AND MWO.DIVISION_CD = MWC.DIVISION_CD AND MWO.WORK_CENTER_CD = MWC.WORK_CENTER_CD AND MDL.COMPANY_CD = MIC.COMPANY_CD AND MDL.DIVISION_CD = MIC.DIVISION_CD AND MDL.ITEM_ID = MIC.ITEM_ID AND MWO.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MWO.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MWO.WO_TYPE = 'MR' AND MWO.PLAN_DATE BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{planDateSD, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{planDateED, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 0.99999
AND (UPPER(MI.ITEM_ID) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{itemIdNm , jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%' OR UPPER(MI.ITEM_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{itemIdNm , jdbcType=VARCHAR}))
AND (UPPER(MWO.WORK_ORDER_ID ) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{workOrderId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%')
AND (UPPER(MWO.WORK_CENTER_CD) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{workCenterCdNm , jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%' OR UPPER(MWC.WORK_CENTER_CD) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{workCenterCdNm , jdbcType=VARCHAR}))
AND (UPPER(MDL.ITEM_ID) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{consumeItemIdNm , jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%' OR UPPER(MIC.ITEM_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{consumeItemIdNm , jdbcType=VARCHAR}))
) A WHERE ROW_COUNT BETWEEN #{startPage, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND #{endPage, jdbcType=INTEGER}
